text:
(This is actually for JMeter v1.8, but that's not in the version list!)
When moving elements around the tree using drag-and-drop, if I drag to a place
where no node (such as near the node being moved) is highlighted, then release
the mouse button, the little document icon stays where it is and can be dragged
again by picking it up with the mouse.
(Related to this, the root node can be dragged and inserted somewhere into the
tree, thereby wiping the whole tree.)
creator: richard.wiseman@bt.com

text:
Accepting bug -- verified both behaviours still happen in current CVS (as of
18th Jan 2003).

Marking as Major High Priority -- since it leads to data loss.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text:
Fixed:  
No longer possible to drag test plan elements or workbenchs
no longer possible to drag elements into their own sub-nodes
panel is refreshed after failed draggins to remove document icon
creator: mstover1@apache.org
